value:
$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|It almost seems a waste to be in
such a splendid state and not have
your loved ones here with you...$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|Mercedes, I think we've discussed
this enough, don't you?$k$pLet's focus on getting all the
preparations done here. I'll take
care of the trays of sweets.$k$pHmm... Our selection of foods
seems to be lacking somehow.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Ayra, I— Oh, Tailtiu! Might I have
a moment of your time?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会ティルテュ,ch06_08_Tailto_F_Teatime23,Face|What do you need?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Teatime23,Face|Hello, Lysithea, Ferdinand...
Do we have foods ready to
accompany the tea?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|*munch* *gulp* ...Yes! They are
on their way as we speak!$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|Lysithea's presentation is sure getting
more and more...refined. I wonder
how she'll manage.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_双界アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|Has everyone been served their
tea and sweets? Can we finally catch
our breath now, Mercedes?$k$p$WmMPID_ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Normal,Face|Mother! There you are!$k$p$WmMPID_スカサハ,ch06_34_Scathach_M_Normal,Face|May we have some tea too?$k$p$WmMPID_双界アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|...Larcei! Scáthach! What...brings
you here?$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Since you weren't able to invite
them yourself, I thought we might
be able to help.$k$pTailtiu was able to have Arthur
and Tine invite them for us.$k$p$WmMPID_ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Normal,Face|That's right! They said they were
throwing a tea party and asked if
we would like to join.$k$p$WmMPID_スカサハ,ch06_34_Scathach_M_Normal,Face|We did not come alone either.$k$p$WmMPID_シャナン,ch06_21_Shanan_M_Normal,Face|Hello, Ayra...$k$p$WmMPID_双界アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|Sh-Shannan?! I...can't believe
you came!$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Ayra... I hope I didn't overstep...$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|No, no... This is...good.$k$p$WmMPID_スカサハ,ch06_34_Scathach_M_Normal,Face|Are you sure? If you'd rather
us not be here, Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_双界アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|No, please, stay.$k$pI was just reflecting that I now have
the opportunity to be the mother to
you I've never been, but...$k$pI'm dressed like...this.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|You're embarrassed of the outfit?$k$p$WmMPID_ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Normal,Face|Mother... I think it's cute! I'm glad
we got to see you all dressed up.$k$p$WmMPID_スカサハ,ch06_34_Scathach_M_Normal,Face|Agreed. Even if you feel silly,
you carry it nobly, Mother.$k$pSo...will you join us for some tea?$k$p$WmMPID_双界アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|*sigh* You're right.$k$pPerhaps I was overly concerned
with my role as a parent.$k$pBut family is about being together
and sharing experiences—and being
thankful for what joys we can find.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|In that case...I think we can all
take our seats!$k$pAyra will prepare tea for everyone.$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|R-right... Mercedes, would you mind
lending me a hand?$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Of course. *giggle*$k$p$Sbs150|
